descriptionHtml:
[size=15]Wintercross\' Ancient Art of Magick[/size]
[img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/imageshare/images/177389-1334723596.jpg[/img]
Hey there, this mod is just a simple spell expansion I\'m working on. Trying to add in some interesting, lore friendly spells!

[b]CHANGELOG:[/b]
========================================================
Version 1.2 - Added \'Arkay\'s Breath\' Spellsword Combat Enchantment
	    - Added \'Binding of Souls\' Spellsword Combat Enchantment



Version 1.1 - Fixed \'Wreath of Fire\' spell book giving player wrong spell.
	    - Added \'Wreath of Sparks\' and \'Wreath of Frost\'


Version 1.0 - Initial Release!





CURRENT SPELLS:
========================================================
[b]Destruction School-[/b]

[b]Wreath of Flames:[/b] (Apprentice Level)
This is a utility for Spellswords. It enchants a non-enchanted weapon with 15 firedamage for 30 minutes. 
If you use a magic scaling mod like Mighty Magic; then the enchantments power will scale with your skill. 
If you sheath your weapon the spell will end prematurely. 

(The limitation for these spells are they only work on single, one-handed weapons that are not currently enchanted. 
Weapon usualy has to be drawn for you to equip the spell)

I am going to make more of these \'Combat Enchantment\' spells for different schools. (eg. Soultrap, fear, turn undead)



[b]Bralsa\'s Firebloom:[/b] (Adept Level)
A rapid fire Firebolt spell. It works like a concentration spell (like flames) but fires firebolt projectiles.

Named after the Dunmer Bralsa Andaren, the master destruction trainer from Oblivion.





[b]Divayth\'s Relentless Fury:[/b] (Master Level)
This is similar to Bralsa\'s Firebloom, except this spell is a ritual spell (like thunderstorm) that shoots fireballs that explode. It will also drain your magicka realy fast.

Named after Divayth Fyr, the realy freaking old Dunmer sorceror from Morrowind.



[b]Wreath of Sparks:[/b] (Apprentice Level)
This is a utility for Spellswords. It enchants a non-enchanted weapon with 15 shockdamage for 30 minutes.




[b]Wreath of Frost:[/b] (Apprentice Level)
This is a utility for Spellswords. It enchants a non-enchanted weapon with 15 frostdamage for 30 minutes.


[b]Restoration School-[/b]


[b]NEW!
Breath of Arkay:[/b] (Adept Level)
This is a utility for Spellswords. It enchants a non-enchanted weapon with a combination of Turn Undead, Bonus damage to undead and a 10% chance to destroy undead instantly 
(20% is PC has Necromage perk).



[b]Conjuration School-[/b]


[b]NEW!
Binding of Souls:[/b] (Adept Level)
This is a utility for Spellswords. It enchants a non-enchanted weapon with a a soultrap spell for 30 minutes.

[b]LOCATION:[/b]
========================================================
All spells are sold by their respective trainer in the Mages College.

I have altered the merchant chests to add the spells directly instead of messing with leveled lists, as I only want the spells sold at the college.

Will work on more intergration (ie NPC\'s with the spells) later =P








Some more spells I\'m going to add in future versions:
========================================================
